name: Death Crossing
description:
My fist attempt at a full 3D game, had to leave it in this prototype state as I alone can't finish it in a reasonable time. I did all the Programing, Character Modeling and Design. All foliage and structures are CC0, some edited to fit in the game.

Inspired by a certain famous game where you cross with animals, but with survival horror elements

Summary: Tired from your miserable daily live you accept a creepy but hard to refuse offer to an undisclosed job on a remote town, promising a fulfilling life experience...

Keyboard and Mouse Controls: Mouse: Look around, WASD: Move, Space: Interact, Shift: Run, Right Click: Attack, Left Click: Aim, Tab: Open Inventory and Tasks, 1-4: Equip Weapon, F: Flashlight, ESC: Pause Game. F5: Change perspective

Joystick Controls: Right Stick: Look around, Left Stick: Move, A: Interact, B: Run, X: Attack, LT: Aim, Y: Open Inventory and Task, Pad: Equip Weapon, LB: Flashlight, Start: Pause Game. Select: Change perspective

How to use the inventory: To equip a weapon, you drag it from the stack (big bottom square) to a slot (one of the four top squares). Or, you click on a weapon from the stack to focus it, then click on a slot to equip it, click or select an equipped slot to clear it. Press 1, 2, 3, 4 or the Pad to use the weapon from the corresponding slot, press it again or press an empty slot to retrieve it.
